artist: Artist: Keith Rosson; Author: Gena Mason , et al.; Publisher: Microcosm Publishing, Bloomington, Ind.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, letterpress text and photomechanical illustration of a figure walking into a door with a file labeled "YOU" printed in color offset lithography on wove paper covers; 39 pp.
medium: Color offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: The CIA Makes Science Fiction Unexciting, no. 3: A look at the way the PATRIOT act and post 9/11 "security" changed our civil liberties and infringed upon basic American rights
